pydygp.linlatentforcemodels.mlfm_mh_ns.MLFM_MH_NS.phi_setup¶

MLFM_MH_NS.phi_setup(phi_inv_scale_abs=None, phi_priors=None, phi_proposals=None)[source]¶

Sets up the x gp hyperparameters

Allows the option to specify a prior and proposal distribution for the hyper parameters, \(\mathbf{\phi}_k\) for each of the \(K\) Gaussian processes modelling the latent trajectories

The model also assumes the \(\phi_{k0}\) parameter is a ‘scale’ parameter and therefore its inverse may be given a conjugate Gamma(a, b) prior. This defauls to a Gamma(1, 1) prior for each dimension although may be customised by providing a list of length K
